text: Sham Lal (born 1938) is an Indian gymnast. He competed in seven events at the 1956 Summer Olympics. He became first Indian to win the Arjuna Award in 1961 for gymnastics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of India Category:Gymnasts at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Sham Lal (gymnast)
